ca.ucalgary.seng300.a2

Class DisplayDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ucalgary.seng300.a2.DisplayDriver

  • public class DisplayDriver
extends java.lang.Object
    A driver for the display that will handle the display of messages, including timing and scheduling messages and updating the display

    • Method Detail

      • newMessage

        public void newMessage(java.lang.String message)
        Displays a new message on the display
        Parameters:
        message - The message to display

      • newMessage

        public void newMessage(java.lang.String message,
                       int duration)
        Displays a new message for some arbitrary duration on the display. After the given duration, either the then-current credit will be shown, or the flashing greeting screen will be shown.
        Parameters:
        message - The message to display
        duration - The duration to display the message for

      • getMessageTask

        ca.ucalgary.seng300.a2.DisplayDriver.DisplayMessageTask getMessageTask(java.lang.String message)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        message task that displays the message

        Creates a new task that clears the display
        Returns:
        task to clear the display

      • greetingMessage

        public void greetingMessage()
        Displays the default message The default message is displayed for set time and is then blank for the remainder of the cycle time

      • clearMessage

        public void clearMessage()
        Deprecated. This method should not be used. The display should never be perma-cleared.
        Clears the display indefinitely.

      • getGreeetingMessage

        public static java.lang.String getGreeetingMessage()
        Gets the greeting message which is displayed when the vending machine is idle and has no credit stored.
        Returns:
        The default (greeting) message.
